genmean: Any object of this general size and shape (small and rectangular), such as a certificate, sheet of paper, menu, memo, etc., or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, especially a bill or a receipt.
oldentry: Popular explanation: the outline of a small square.
nomlex: 1. A written statement of money that you owe for goods or services. English = bill.
2. A piece of paper that you give or send to someone to confirm that you have received money or goods from them. English = receipt.
